info.title: ZSR Webservice v1
info.description: This is the ZSR Webservice v1 documentation (binary version v1.4.28).

post.summary: Creates or updates care provider certification periods and health services of one specific care provider. The request must always contain the full set historicised data.

202.description: Accepted. The provided data has been accepted and is scheduled to be applied asynchronously.

post.summary: Returns details for specific clearing numbers (ZSR/RCC/CPR). The returned data is to be specified as a list of plain clearing numbers as parameters.

requestBody.description:
A list of plain clearing numbers.
Validations:
  • Max. 500 clearing numbers per request.

post.summary: Returns details for specific employees. The returned data is to be specified as a list of plain employee numbers (K-Nummer / Num√©ro C / Numero di controllo) as parameters.

requestBody.description:
A list of plain employee numbers.
Validations:
  • Max. 500 employee numbers per request.

get.summary: Get all comments available on health services.
Returns a paged list of clearing numbers (ZSR/RCC/CPR) and/or employee numbers (K-Nummer / Num√©ro C / Numero di controllo) by subscription search options.

parameters.name: filterOptions
parameters.description:
A set of OR-combined filter options to control the result set. Multiple selections are possible, but select at least one.

Your licensed subscription options allow you to access following filter options:

  • Okp: Chiropractors, DelegatedPsychotherapy, Dentists, DispensariesMiGeL, Doctors, DoctorFacilitiesForOutpatienNursing, Hospitals, Laboratories, Midwives, Neuropsychologists, Nurses, NursingHomes, NutritionCounselors, OccupationalTherapists, Orthopedists, OtherBillers, Pharmacies, Physiotheraphists, Spas, SpeechTherapists, Spitex, TransportRescueCompanies, Podiatrists, PsychologicalPsychotherapists
  • Ortho: Orthopedists
  • Pharma: Pharmacies
  • Lea: Hospitals
  • Comp: ComplementaryTherapists
  • Fit: Fitness
  • Asca: Asca, ComplementaryTherapists
  • Spak: Spak, ComplementaryTherapists
  • Aptn: Aptn, ComplementaryTherapists
  • Emr: Emr, ComplementaryTherapists
  • EmFit: EmFit, Fitness
  • Qtop: Qtop, Fitness
  • QCert: QCert, Fitness
  • FGuide: FGuide, Fitness
  • FGuideK: FGuideK, Fitness
  • MedUnreg: Dentists, Chiropractors, Doctors, Pharmacies

parameters.name: numberTypes
parameters.description: A set of OR-combined number filter options to control the result set. Multiple selections are possible, but select at least one.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of entries used as offset to retrieve the next page. The next offset it must be calculated as sum of the previously used offset and the page size (limit).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximal number of entries in the next returned page. Receiving a recordCount smaller than the limit indicates that the last page has been reached.

parameters.name: modifiedFrom
parameters.description:
Reduces the result set to numbers modified after this date (ISO 8601 time format, e.g: 2020-01-20T07:10:00Z).
Any content and/or technical data change of a number will mark this number as modified.
A consuming client must always be able to handle any quantity of modified numbers.
System maintenances resulting in a large amount of modified numbers will not be notified in advance.

post.summary: Returns basic information about clearing and/or employee numbers. The returned data is to be specified as a list of plain clearing (ZSR/RCC/CPR) and/or employee numbers (K-Nummer / Num√©ro C / Numero di controllo) as parameters.

requestBody.description:
A list of clearing (ZSR/RCC/CPR) and/or employee numbers (K-Nummer / Num√©ro C / Numero di controllo).
Validations:
  • Max. 500 employee numbers per request.

post.summary: Returns details for specific unregistered Medreg care provider. The returned data is to be specified as a list of plain global location numbers passed as parameters.

requestBody.description:
A list of plain global location numbers.
Validations:
  • Max. 500 global location numbers per request.

startDate.description: Date of the validity start (=fachliches Startdatum). Time information will be ignored. Validity starts at the beginning of the specified day.

endDate.description: Date of the validity end (=fachliches Enddatum). Time information will be ignored. Validity ends at the end of the specified day. If the period lasts indefinitely, the max date '9999-12-31 23:59:59.9999999' must be provided.

nameDe.description: The health service name in German.

nameFr.description: The health service name in French.

nameIt.description: The health service name in Italian.

clearingNumber.description:
The clearing number (=ZSR-Nummer) identifying the care provider uniquely.
Validations:
  • Clearing number check digit accoring to the documentation.

externalId.description:
The identification of the care provider in the system of the API consumer.
Validations:
  • Must contain numbers only.

careProviderHealthServices.description: Health services for the care provider.

careProviderCertificationPeriods.description: Certification periods for the care provider.

subscriberId.description: The subscriber id according to the subscribers-Endpoint.

externalId.description:
The identification of the health service in the system of the API consumer.
Validations:
  • Must contain numbers only.

isValid.description: Is true, if the instance was valid at the requested validityDate. If no specific validityDate was specified, then the current date (now) is evaluated (=fachliche G√ºltigkeit zum Zeitpunkt des √ºbergebenen Stichdatums).
